thread.title: BRIEF-Rakuten To Issue 200 Bln Yen To Enter Japan's Mobile Phone Service Market

title: BRIEF-Rakuten To Issue 200 Bln Yen To Enter Japan's Mobile Phone Service Market
text:
April 19, 2018 / 4:58 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Rakuten To Issue 200 Bln Yen To Enter Japan's Mobile Phone Service Market Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Nikkei: 
* RAKUTEN WILL ISSUE AS MUCH AS 200 BILLION YEN TO PREPARE FOR ITS ENTRY INTO JAPANâ€™S MOBILE PHONE SERVICE MARKET - NIKKEI 
* RAKUTEN PLANS TO LAUNCH ITS SERVICE IN OCT 2019, INVEST ABOUT 600 BILLION YEN TO BUILD NECESSARY INFRASTRUCTURE - NIKKEI 
* RAKUTEN WILL FINANCE INVESTMENT WITH SUBORDINATED DEBT, TO BE ISSUED AS EARLY AS JUNE, AND BANK LOANS WORTH 400 BILLION YEN - NIKKEI Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
